H0.text: who added a press room to the white house. Theodore Roosevelt

H1.text: who added a press room to the white house. Franklin D. Roosevelt

H2.text: who added a press room to the white house. Harry S. Truman

H3.text: who added a press room to the white house. Richard Nixon

A4.text: Truman ordered an addition to the exterior of the White House: a second-floor balcony in the south portico, which came to be known as the Truman Balcony.

A5.text: Theodore Roosevelt asked that planners include permanent space for the press corps in the executive office building now called the West Wing.
